snippet: The new round valued Prosper at $1.7 billion, more than double its valuation this time last year, highlighting the continued interest in loan marketplaces.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The new round valued Prosper at $1.7 billion, more than double its valuation this time last year, highlighting the continued interest in loan marketplaces.

headline.main: Prosper Marketplace Raises $165 Million in Latest Funding Round
